thoughts.text: Since the 'browse_website' command did not provide me with the information I was looking for, I think I should use the 'google' command to search for more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail.
thoughts.reasoning: The 'web_search' command provided me with a lot of information, but browsing the website directly did not give me the information I needed. I think using the 'google' command will give me a wider range of search results to choose from.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for information about the Brno Reservoir Trail
- Review the search results and choose the most relevant website to visit
- Take notes on important information
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not spending too much time on the search results and getting distracted from my main goal of exploring the area.
thoughts.speak: I think I should use the 'google' command to search for more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail.
